description: The main entry point for a Flutter application that sets up environment variables, shared preferences, application state, and the widget tree with routing and theming.

classes.name: VideoCallingApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, setting up providers, theme, and router configuration.

methods.name: _bootstrap
methods.description: Asynchronous setup function to initialize Flutter bindings, environment variables, shared preferences and application state before running the app.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that calls bootstrap and runs the Flutter app with the root widget.
